ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT Instruments (was complete heal)
ygData.msgSnippet: What about Bard Riverdancing??!! No wait, that won t work, those dancers never move there arms.  We d still need to strum drumsticks. Though I do think some of
ygData.messageBody:
What about Bard Riverdancing??!!

No wait, that won't work, those dancers never move there arms. We'd still
need to strum drumsticks.

Though I do think some of the bard-only clothing should have included
toe-shoes, sequined leotards, and Vegas-chorus-line-style, rediculously
large headdresses. Oh wait, we've got the head dresses...

Peace
Evulia, Lady of the Dance




Windleaf
Mistsong To: eqbards@egroups.com,
<windleaf@tats "'eqbards@egroups.com'"
ukawa.com> <eqbards@egroups.com>
cc:
01/25/2001 Subject: RE: [eqbards] OT
03:32 PM Instruments (was complete heal)
Please respond
to eqbards






Bard Oktoberfest!

Our bardic quest would be lederhosen with matching hat and then all do a
drunken chicken dance.

Oooompah Oooompah Ooompah pah

Or is that just a little too silly? Hrm

---Windleaf
